response.name: Listing Cards
Response 200
response.body:
[ { "content": "

If you can’t find the answers by using the built in Help system, or you are having a technical problem with PostalMate, PC Synergy’s Customer Support team will be glad to help you.

Information on PC Synergy's website

Technical Notes (\"TechNotes\"), Frequently Asked Questions/Answers (FAQ's), Release Notes, Downloads, Products and other helpful information are maintained on PC Synergy's website: www.pcsynergy.com

Email your questions

Send your questions via email to: support@pcsynergy.com

Voice telephone support

For registered PostalMate owners with current paid annual maintenance, technical support is available Monday through Friday between 5:30 AM and 5:30 PM, Pacific Time, except on these major holidays:

  • New Year’s Day

  • Memorial Day

  • Independence Day (July 4th)

  • Labor Day

  • Thanksgiving

  • Christmas

For support by phone, call: (760) 410-1677. Press \"1\", once, when you hear the voice mail greeting.

response.name: Response 200
response.body:
{ "content": "

The FedEx 2 Day Letter has moved to Fixed Rate service in PostalMate. When shipping Carrier-branded, rates for this service will display up to 8 oz. If your envelope is heavier than this, you'll need to ship it via Generic packaging (weight-based).

Note: FASC Bonus Weight (up to 1.5 lbs) applies to the following envelopes:

  • Standard Overnight

  • First Overnight

FedEx 2Day and FedEx Express Saver allow up to 8 oz in an envelope and do not qualify for bonus weight.
